function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low physical activity levels among Italian adults, especially during COVID-19 quarantine","Impact":"Increased risk of health issues due to reduced physical activity levels","Mitigation":"Encourage and facilitate home-based vigorous-intensity activities to compensate for reduced physical activity","Technologies":"Fitness apps, online exercise programs, and wearable fitness trackers","People":"Italian adults aged 30 and above","Owner":"Health organizations, fitness trainers, and individuals"},{"Description":"Difficulty in performing intense exercise at home compared to moderate activity","Impact":"Decreased physical fitness and increased risk of sedentary lifestyle-related health issues","Mitigation":"Provide guidance on home-based vigorous-intensity exercise options and encourage the use of household items for exercise","Technologies":"Online exercise tutorials, virtual personal training sessions, and fitness equipment for home use","People":"Individuals staying at home during COVID-19 quarantine","Owner":"Fitness trainers, health professionals, and individuals"},{"Description":"Challenges of maintaining physical activity levels during quarantine","Impact":"Increased risk of sedentary behavior and associated health problems","Mitigation":"Promote awareness of the importance of physical activity, provide resources for home-based exercise, and offer motivational support","Technologies":"Remote fitness coaching, virtual workout communities, and online fitness challenges","People":"Individuals subject to quarantine restrictions","Owner":"Health organizations, fitness trainers, and individuals"}]}
